item.description:
It's here! Our annual Halloween Party will be Sunday October 21st from 11:00am-1:00pm. Pups can Bob for Apples, Do Tricks for Treats, Join in a Howling at the Moon Sing-a-long, or Play "Mummy" Says! Costumes are welcome for the Monster Mash Parade! We can't wait to see everyone again to Celebrate Halloween!

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Howl-o-ween Party!
